(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB Imagine)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (S
            (NP (PRP you))
            (VP (VBP have)
              (VP (VBN been)
                (VP (VBN dieting)
                  (PP (IN on)
                    (NP
                      (NP (JJ fresh) (NN garden) (NN salad))
                      (PP (IN for)
                        (NP (DT a) (NN week)))))
                  (SBAR (IN in) (NN order)
                    (S
                      (VP (TO to)
                        (VP (VB get)
                          (NP (DT a) (JJ good) (NN cholesterol) (NN test) (NN result))))))))))
          (CC and)
          (S
            (NP (NN today))
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (NN day))
                (SBAR
                  (S
                    (NP (PRP you))
                    (VP (VBD got)
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT the) (NN test))
                        (VP (VBN done))))))))))))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, Imagine-1)
nsubjpass(dieting-5, you-2)
aux(dieting-5, have-3)
auxpass(dieting-5, been-4)
dep(Imagine-1, dieting-5)
prep(dieting-5, on-6)
amod(salad-9, fresh-7)
nn(salad-9, garden-8)
pobj(on-6, salad-9)
prep(salad-9, for-10)
det(week-12, a-11)
pobj(for-10, week-12)
mark(get-16, in-13)
dep(get-16, order-14)
aux(get-16, to-15)
advcl(dieting-5, get-16)
det(result-21, a-17)
amod(result-21, good-18)
nn(result-21, cholesterol-19)
nn(result-21, test-20)
dobj(get-16, result-21)
cc(dieting-5, and-22)
nsubj(day-26, today-23)
cop(day-26, is-24)
det(day-26, the-25)
conj(dieting-5, day-26)
nsubj(got-28, you-27)
rcmod(day-26, got-28)
det(test-30, the-29)
dobj(got-28, test-30)
partmod(test-30, done-31)


(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP$ Your) (NN taste) (NNS buds))
      (VP (VBP have)
        (VP (VBN been)
          (VP (VBN deprived)
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP
                (NP (NN attention))
                (PP (IN for)
                  (NP (DT a) (NN week)))))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (VBP are)
        (ADVP (RB really))
        (VP (VBG looking)
          (PP (IN for)
            (NP (NN something)))
          (PP (IN with)
            (NP
              (NP (DT a) (NN bit))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (NNP KICK))))))))
    (. ...)))


poss(buds-3, Your-1)
nn(buds-3, taste-2)
nsubjpass(deprived-6, buds-3)
aux(deprived-6, have-4)
auxpass(deprived-6, been-5)
root(ROOT-0, deprived-6)
prep(deprived-6, of-7)
pobj(of-7, attention-8)
prep(attention-8, for-9)
det(week-11, a-10)
pobj(for-9, week-11)
cc(deprived-6, and-12)
nsubj(looking-16, you-13)
aux(looking-16, are-14)
advmod(looking-16, really-15)
conj(deprived-6, looking-16)
prep(looking-16, for-17)
pobj(for-17, something-18)
prep(looking-16, with-19)
det(bit-21, a-20)
pobj(with-19, bit-21)
prep(bit-21, of-22)
pobj(of-22, KICK-23)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT A) (VBG piping) (JJ hot) (NN bowl))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (JJ curry) (NN mee))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADJP (JJ sure))
      (S
        (VP (VB cure)
          (PP (IN for)
            (NP (PRP$ your) (VBN deprived) (NN taste) (NNS buds))))))
    (. .)))

  (FRAG (CC But)
    (RB not)
    (NP
      (NP (RB just) (DT any) (JJ curry) (NN mee))
      (VP (VBN yah)))
    (. !)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (NN sign))
      (PP (IN on)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NN front))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (DT the) (NN stall))))))
    (VP (VBZ says)
      (NP (PRP it))
      (ADVP
        (ADVP (RB quite) (RB clearly))
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (DT this) (NN stall))
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (NP (`` ``)
                (NP (DT the) (NN one))
                (CC and)
                (NP (JJ only))
                ('' '')))))))))


det(sign-2, The-1)
nsubj(says-9, sign-2)
prep(sign-2, on-3)
det(front-5, the-4)
pobj(on-3, front-5)
prep(front-5, of-6)
det(stall-8, the-7)
pobj(of-6, stall-8)
root(ROOT-0, says-9)
dobj(says-9, it-10)
advmod(clearly-12, quite-11)
advmod(says-9, clearly-12)
mark(one-19, that-13)
det(stall-15, this-14)
nsubj(one-19, stall-15)
cop(one-19, is-16)
det(one-19, the-18)
ccomp(clearly-12, one-19)
cc(one-19, and-20)
conj(one-19, only-21)

    (. .)))

    (NP
      (NP (NN contrast))
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP (DT the) (NNP Tau) (NNP Pok)))

        (WHNP (WDT which))
        (S
          (VP (VBZ has)
            (VP (VBN been)
              (VP (VBG stewing)
                (PP (IN in)
                  (NP (DT the) (NN curry))))))))
      (, ,))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT the)
        (ADJP (RB plain) (JJ white))
        (NN chicken))
      (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
        (NP
          (NP (NNP ala) (NNP Hainanese) (NNP Curry) (NNP Mee))
          (NP (NN style)))
        (-RRB- -RRB-)))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB simply))
      (VP
        (VP (VBN added)
          (PP (IN on)
            (NP
              (NP (NN top))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (DT the) (NNS noodles))))))
        (CC and)
        (VP (VBN soaked)
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP (DT the) (NN curry))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB really))
    (VP
      (VP (VBP like)
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (NP (DT this) (NN way))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (MD would)
        (ADVP (RB frequently))
        (VP (VB buy)
          (NP (JJ white) (NN chicken))
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB eat)
                (PP (IN with)
                  (NP (NN laksa)))))))))
    (. .)))

advmod(like-3, really-2)
root(ROOT-0, like-3)

cc(like-3, and-7)

advmod(buy-10, frequently-9)
conj(like-3, buy-10)

          (JJ fragrant)))

(ROOT
  (ADJP (JJ Guranteed)
    (S
      (VP (TO to)
        (VP (VB give)
          (NP (PRP you))
          (NP (DT that) (NN lemak) (NN fix)))))
    (. !)))
